sentence.Network_en: They were united in their detestation of the government.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们出于对政府的共同痛恨而联合起来。

sentence.Network_en: People always hold this abominable behaviour in detestation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种恶劣作风一向叫人看不惯.

sentence.Network_en: We all hold these old customs in detestation.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们都非常嫌恶这些旧习惯.

PerfectNetExp.abs: People always hold this abominable behaviour in detestation ., 这种恶劣作风一向叫人看不惯.

list.abs: I hate Mexican food ; She detests politicians ., 我憎恨墨西哥食物 ; 她憎恨政客.
eg . I don't love you , not at all ; the contrary , I detest you .我不爱你，一点儿也不；相反，我讨厌你。
I detest spiders ., 我讨厌蜘蛛.
I detest dirty houses ., 我厌恶肮脏的房屋.
油然而生等习语常用语的翻译 -... ... deportment 风度、举止 detest evil 嫉恶如仇 Diamond cuts diamond. 天外有天。.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Old French from Latin detestatio(n-), from the verb detestari (see detest)

entry.def: If you detest someone or something, you dislike them very much.

auth_sentence.content: To abhor evil is to have it in moral detestation.
auth_sentence.res_content: To abhor evil is to have it in moral detestation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To abhor evil is to have it in moral detestation.

auth_sentence.content: The juiciest material is Sofya's detestation of Chertkov, whose celibacy she suspects is really just a cover for homosexuality.
auth_sentence.res_content: The juiciest material is Sofya's detestation of Chertkov, whose celibacy she suspects is really just a cover for homosexuality.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The juiciest material is Sofya's detestation of Chertkov, whose celibacy she suspects is really just a cover for homosexuality.
